profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses exclusively on traditional software engineering tasks such as backend development, API creation, data ingestion services, and driving backend architecture. There is no mention of AI/ML models, generative AI, or related specialized tasks. The primary language used is English. The role is therefore classified as a 'Software Engineer'.
